name: Midlander Billet Trove
desc:
A precious strongbox that contains a billet filled with potential. It is capable of changing its shape to fit the wishes of its owner.

Use this item to choose one of the following items:

  • ・Midlander Sword Billet

  • ・Midlander Bow Billet

  • ・Midlander Claymore Billet

  • ・Midlander Catalyst Billet

  • ・Midlander Polearm Billet

value.name: Imaginarium Theater
value.desc:
The Imaginarium Theater is a permanent domain with challenges constantly updated on the 1st of each month. It is unlocked at Adventure Rank 35.

Before the beginning of all stories, after the end of all tales, in the interstice between reality and fantasy, there is an endless drama unfolding, never ceasing upon the stage – There is no beginning, nor an end, for in the telling of the "story," the two differ not.

customize.name: Midlander Sword Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.

Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

customize.name: Midlander Bow Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.

Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.
